bll

Class OrderBLL

  • java.lang.Object
    • bll.OrderBLL

  • public class OrderBLL
extends java.lang.Object
    Business Logic class for the Order table, implementing methods used to further enhance the usage of the SQL queries

      method used to delete an order from the database
      void deleteOrderByFlag(Order order)
      method to apparently delete an order from the database does not truly delete the order, but it changes the "deleted" flag from 0 to 1

      method used to retrieve all the orders from the table

      • findOrderById

        public Order findOrderById(int id)
        method used to find a certain order with a specified id
        Parameters:
        id - int representing the id of the order to be searched
        Returns:
        an Order object representing the corresponding order or null, if the order was not found

      • findAllOrders

        public java.util.List<Order> findAllOrders()
        method used to retrieve all the orders from the table
        Returns:
        a list of Order objects or null, in case the table is empty

      • findOrderByIdClient

        public Order findOrderByIdClient(int id)
        method used to find a certain order with a specified client id
        Parameters:
        id - int representing the id of the client whose order is searched
        Returns:
        an Order object representing the corresponding order or null, if the order was not found

      • insertOrder

        public int insertOrder(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String product,
                       int quantity)
        method used to insert an order in the database if the order exists, it will update the existing order
        Parameters:
        name - String representing the name of the order to be inserted
        product - String representing the address of the order to be inserted
        quantity - int representing the quantity of the product in the order
        Returns:
        -1 if the client already exists, 1 if it does not

      • updateOrder

        public void updateOrder(Order order)
        method to update an existing order from the database
        Parameters:
        order - Order to be updated

      • deleteOrder

        public void deleteOrder(Order order)
        method used to delete an order from the database
        Parameters:
        order - Order to be deleted from the database

      • deleteOrderByFlag

        public void deleteOrderByFlag(Order order)
        method to apparently delete an order from the database does not truly delete the order, but it changes the "deleted" flag from 0 to 1
        Parameters:
        order - the Order to be deleted from the database
